coins@tower.name: coins
coins@tower.examine: The coins are very tarnished, but seem to be silver.  They could be valuable.
coins@tower.desc[0]: Some silver coins lie piled up in a heap on the floor.

potion@tower.name: potion
potion@tower.examine: The potion has a small label saying "Restore Strength" on it.
potion@tower.desc[0]: A potion of restore strength lies here.

fountain@tower.name: fountain
fountain@tower.examine:
You see a fountain of fire, not the sort to jump into on New Year's Day,
though it would seem very cosy to have in the living room.

orb@tower.name: orb
orb@tower.examine: The orb is golden, and probably dates from the times of the good king Pippin.
orb@tower.desc[0]: A small gold orb has been left here.

shelf@tower.desc[1]: A wooden shelf on the north wall looks as if it once held many ancient tomes.
shelf@tower.name: shelf
shelf@tower.examine: The shelf seems to be on some kind of wooden sliders, maybe you could push it?
shelf@tower.desc[0]:
A wooden shelf on the north wall looks as if it once held many ancient tomes.
There is a passageway beneath the shelf.

candlestick@tower.desc[1]: A hefty gold candlestick lies here, with a candle in it.
candlestick@tower.name: candlestick
candlestick@tower.examine:
The candlestick is very ornate, with fancy scrollwork and small figurines of
dragons and knights locked in mortal combat.
candlestick@tower.desc[2]: A hefty gold candlestick lies here.
candlestick@tower.desc[0]: A hefty gold candlestick lies here, a candle flickering brightly within it.

blue_candle@tower.desc[1]: There is a blue candle here.
blue_candle@tower.name: blue_candle
blue_candle@tower.desc[0]: A blue candle burns here, emitting a soft flickering flame.

panel@tower.name: panel
panel@tower.desc[0]: A small wooden panel is open in the southern wall.

scroll@tower.name: scroll
scroll@tower.examine:
The scroll reads:
"Read the words in the true light
 and be amazed as you take flight"
scroll@tower.desc[0]: A tattered scroll lies at your feet.

door_tower@tower.name: Door_Tower
door_tower@tower.examine:
You see a jet black marble door, etched with runes and strange symbols which
you do not recognise.  You see no locks of mortal means.

fire@tower.desc[1]: The ashes of a fire smoulder in a corner.
fire@tower.name: fire
fire@tower.desc[0]: A large fire blazes away in one corner.

book@tower.desc[1]: A large book rests on the shelf.
book@tower.name: book
book@tower.examine:
The book details the preparation of a potion of magical strength recovery.

Ingredients:
     Bat's Wing
     Toad's Foot
     Lizard's Claw
     Four Pints of Blood
     Eagle's Egg

Stir well and leave to simmer for at least 10 minutes.
book@tower.desc[0]: There is a large mystical looking book here.

runes@tower.name: runes
runes@tower.examine:
The runes are worn and hard to read, but seem to allude to some kind of
mystical ball which radiated a 'true color' of some sort.
runes@tower.desc[0]: Some mysterious runes are etched on the wall.

crown@tower.name: crown
crown@tower.examine:
The crown seems suitable for a king, since it is lavishly decorated with
sparkling gems and has a silken lining.  Wouldn't you want to be one ?
crown@tower.desc[0]: A beautiful gold crown lies here.

red_candle@tower.desc[1]: There is a red candle here.
red_candle@tower.name: red_candle
red_candle@tower.desc[0]: A red candle burns here, emitting a soft flickering flame.

wand@tower.name: wand
wand@tower.desc[0]: A short, slender wand lies here.

green_candle@tower.desc[1]: There is a green candle here.
green_candle@tower.name: green_candle
green_candle@tower.desc[0]: A green candle burns here, emitting a soft flickering flame.

door_shazareth@tower.name: Door_Shazareth
door_shazareth@tower.examine:
The door is made of solid marble and perfectly fits the doorway.  It is very
smooth and appears to be unmarked in any way, except for a single, large red
eye at its center, which appears to follow you around the room.

ball@tower.desc[1]: The centre of the room is filled with an expanding ball of light.
ball@tower.name: ball
ball@tower.examine:
You attempt to examine the ball closer, but it's much too bright.  Your eyes
start watering and you get a headache.
ball@tower.desc[2]: The room is filled with an expanding ball of light.
ball@tower.desc[0]: A ball of light floats in the centre of the room.

door_treasure@tower.desc[1]: The door to the north is closed.
door_treasure@tower.name: Door_Treasure
door_treasure@tower.examine:
The door is made of solid marble and perfectly fits the doorway.  It is very
smooth and appears to be unmarked in any way, except for a single, large red
eye at its center, which appears to follow you around the room.
door_treasure@tower.desc[2]: The door to the north is locked.
door_treasure@tower.desc[0]: The door to the north is open.

ring@tower.name: ring
ring@tower.examine: It looks as if it will fit tightly on any sized finger.
ring@tower.desc[0]: A small gold ring has been dropped here.

chute_bot@tower.name: chute_Bot
chute_bot@tower.desc[0]: There is a chute in the wall, too small to climb up.

hole@tower.name: hole
hole@tower.desc[0]: There is a small hole carved into the south wall.

chute_top@tower.name: chute_Top
chute_top@tower.desc[0]: There is a chute in the wall, too small to climb down.

cauldron@tower.name: cauldron
cauldron@tower.examine:
It is the latest luxury model, with contoured edges,inlaid panneling, a timer,
and even a simmer control!  It is also dark black and big enough to cook a man
in!
cauldron@tower.desc[0]: A large cauldron bubbles away before you.

staff@tower.name: staff
staff@tower.examine:
You attempt to decipher the runes.  They seem to be some kind of a protective
spell, maybe against other magical items.
staff@tower.desc[0]: A long runed staff lies here, etched with strange markings.

sceptre@tower.name: sceptre
sceptre@tower.examine:
The sceptre tapers to a narrow end, scarcely two inches in diameter, which
seems scratched and worn away.  Otherwise, the silver finish is perfect.
sceptre@tower.desc[0]: A large silver sceptre has been placed here.

treasure@tower.title: Treasure Chamber
treasure@tower.description:
This is large treasure store and naturally everything in it belongs to the
Sorceror and might take a rather nasty attitude to being removed.

levitation@tower.title: Levitation Room
levitation@tower.description:
You find yourself in a completely black room, even light seems afraid to go
here.  It is completely bare of adornment, and even the walls wouldn't stay if
they had somewhere else to lean!
   There is a single exit in the ceiling high above, and another to the south.
You seem to be floating!

spell@tower.title: Spell Room
spell@tower.description:
This room would appear to be one of the Sorceror's many spell rooms as its
scorched walls show the signs of many a fireball spell or a more dangerous
variant of it.  A single scorched doorway leads north.

potion@tower.title: Potion Store Room
potion@tower.description:
This would appear to be the potion preparation and store room for the
Sorceror, as around you lie shelves once lined with glass vials and bottles
ready to be filled.  A single doorway leads south.

sorceror@tower.title: Sorceror's Room
sorceror@tower.description:
You are in a very large and exceedingly magical room, devoted to the pursuit
of magic in all its form.  Flames dance over the walls to light the scene,
although they are merely for effect as a permanent &+Rfire fountain&* erupts from
the center of the room.  Gargoyles wink at you from the walls and objects move
quietly in complex patterns, getting on with the jobs they have been given.
   There is a door to the south, and a doorway leads west.  A splendid arched
window looks east across the world.

black@tower.title: Black Tower
black@tower.description:
You are in a small dark room in one of the lower levels of the black tower.
It appears to be a store room for spell ingredients which line the shelves on
the northern wall.  An archway leads west to the tower entrance.

candle@tower.title: Candle Room
candle@tower.description:
This room looks like a cross between a Queen video and Madam Toussaud's
after an arson attack, as candles of all shapes, sizes and colors fill the
room.  A passageway leads west.

ante@tower.title: Sorceror's Ante-room
ante@tower.description:
You are standing in the Sorceror's ante-room, which sizzles with magical
energy.  Apart from the hole in the floor the only exit available is to the
east.

scroll@tower.title: Scroll Room
scroll@tower.description:
You are in a large, dry and well lit store room for scrolls, which would
appear to be the Sorceror's supply.

wraith@tower.title: Wraith Room
wraith@tower.description:
You find yourself in the room where the Sorceror keeps his undead creatures,
in particular his pet Wraith, until he needs them.  Exits lead north and west.

base@tower.title: Base of the Tower
base@tower.description:
You are now inside the black tower which stretches up out of the castle.
The walls glisten with sorcery and from high above come the noises of high
level spells and experimentation.
   A doorway leads east into another room, and a door lies north.

magical@tower.title: Magical Item Storeroom
magical@tower.description:
You are standing in a large storeroom which would be packed with magical
artifacts in normal times but it seems that the Sorceror is using their power
for a large spell project that crackles from the top-most level of the tower.
   A doorway leads through to the east to the wraith room, and you tremble at
the thought of the creature which may lie through it, a creature which has been
known to slay even Enchanters in but a single blow...

ledge@tower.title: The Window Ledge
ledge@tower.description:
You are perched on a precarious window ledge looking down the black tower
into the courtyard below.  The safety (?) of the Sorceror's Room is back west.

wraith@tower.name: wraith
wraith@tower.description: The chill shadowy form of a wraith swirls and dances around you.

cat@tower.name: cat
cat@tower.description: A black cat stares at you from the shadows, purring gently.
